association.paragraphB: Do you want to become a member of the association?
association.subtitle: Grant Receivers
association.title: Board Of Association

hero.paragraphA: We're a team of highly motivated experts with a single shared goal: universal data privacy.
hero.paragraphB: With the HOPR protocol, companies and users can decide for themselves who can view their data and who can't.
hero.paragraphC: With the HOPR protocol, data security is solved, letting everyone focus on helping people through digitalization.
hero.paragraphD: The HOPR community is building the digital privacy landscape of tomorrow. We invite everybody to join our movement.
hero.paragraphE: Learn more about the team that builds the HOPR network.
hero.title: Independent, Incorruptible, And Indestructible
